pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, November 3, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, November 3, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with United States Ambassador to Canada, Kelly Craft.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an event to mark the upcoming Veterans' Week and 100th anniversary of the Battle of Passchendaele. He will also deliver brief remarks.

Section 27, National Military Cemetery
Beechwood Cemetery
280 Beechwood Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.

3 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Nishnawbe Aski Nation youth.

Closed to media
